OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord disease type ( acute lymphoblastic leukemia vs. leukemia/lymphoma v medulloblastoma v solid tumor ) . ( Recurrent CNS acute lymphoblastic leukemia stratum open accrual 11/30/04 ) INDUCTION : Patients receive topotecan hydrochloride intrathecally ( IT ) 5 minute twice weekly 6 week .
